thread.title: How Kyrie Irving And Other Athletes Made PSD Underwear Hot Brand
thread.title_full: How Kyrie Irving And Other Athletes Made PSD Underwear Hot Brand

author: Mike Ozanian
title: How Kyrie Irving And Other Athletes Made PSD Underwear Hot Brand
text: [caption id="attachment_0bfd41b6755f43569f0f7bda50899b33" align="" width="640"] Cleveland Cavaliers guard Kyrie Irving (2) dribbles against the Golden State Warriors during the first half of Game 1 of basketball's NBA Finals in Oakland, Calif., Thursday, June 4, 2015. (AP Photo/Ben Margot)[/caption]What do Kyrie Irving, Marshawn Lynch, Stevie Johnson and Chandler Parsons have in common? They all endorse PSD Underwear . Oh, and some guy named LeBron James has also been a part of the excitement.In the video below I chat with co-founder Curt Flaitz, investor Mike Miller and Irving about how PSD got started and where its headed during the latest episode of the three-time Emmy Award winning Forbes SportsMoney .[brightcove videoID=4524694310001]
